comments:
Eclipse 3.2RC2 + ECF 0.7.7
I installed the irc provider from the 'extras' site.

I specified an invalid connection string (I left off the "irc://") when trying to connect to an IRC server and got this error dialog:

Could not connect to sasebb@d1234.na.sas.com/#jbinull
See stack trace in Error Log

One problem is that the chat room was supposed to be "#jbi" but some extra characters got stuck on the end (the characters were random). This might indicate an uninitialized variable or something. The other problem of course was the exception.

The log had:

java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.ecf.provider.irc.identity.IRCNamespace.createInstance(IRCNamespace.java:27)
at org.eclipse.ecf.core.identity.IDFactory.createID(IDFactory.java:232)
at org.eclipse.ecf.core.identity.IDFactory.createID(IDFactory.java:258)
at org.eclipse.ecf.core.identity.IDFactory.createID(IDFactory.java:296)
at org.eclipse.ecf.example.collab.CollabClient.createAndConnectClient(CollabClient.java:51)
at org.eclipse.ecf.example.collab.actions.URIClientConnectAction$ClientConnectJob.run(URIClientConnectAction.java:59)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
Fixed NPE in IRC ID creation
